Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_8ruc1d0n&referenceId=1_8ruc1d0n&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Wall Street is on inflation data watch after the upbeat U.S. October payrolls report. The U.S. is braced for a flood of international visitors after it lifted travel restrictions for much of the world's population. Tesla shares are lower in premarket after Elon Musk's twitter poll favors selling 10% of his stake. Berkshire Hathaway's net income for the latest quarter fell by two-thirds.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3EYjVHl
